ARABIC: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: His inseparable comrade will say, 'This is what I have ready for you.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: His companion will say: "Here is (the record) I have ready with me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: His companion said: “Here is he who was in my charge.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: His (angelic) companion will say, "(Lord), the record of his deeds is with me and is all ready".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And his accompanying angel said, “This is the record of your deeds, available with me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And his companion (angel) will say: "Here is (his record) ready with me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And his companions shall say: This is what is ready with me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And his comrade shall say, 'This is what I have, made ready.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (unto the evil-doer) his comrade saith: This is that which I have ready (as testimony).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: His companion attendant will say, "I have here his record ready."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And his companion will say: this is that which with me is ready.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then his companion [angel] will say, ‘This is what is ready with me [of his record of deeds].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And his Companion will say: "Here is (his Record) ready with me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And his companion (angel) will say: "Here is (this Record) ready with me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And his companion will say: 'This is that which I have present'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And His escort will say, “This is what I have ready with me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:23] And his companion, the angel charged with him, will say, ‘This is what I have ready with me [as testimony]’, whereupon it will be said to Mālik [the Keeper of the Fire]:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (unto the evil-doer) his comrade) the angel who recorded his good deeds; and it is said: the angel who recorded his evil works (saith: This is that which I have) this is that which with you have entrusted me (ready (as testimony)).
